name: nulShade
description:
Two player abstract robotics battle on a single keyboard. Collect energy, build blockers and turrets, fire guided shots, bursts of multiple shots,. dance around as the dynamic camera captures all the action.

1up - WASD move, C fire, V boost, B build

2up - ARROWS move, I fire, O boost, P build

HOLD fire to charge a multi shot burst attack!

HOLD build to drop an auto turret!

Various actions consume energy be sure to collect more,. .
